result.purpose: Analyzes Go code to detect unintended comparisons of functions against nil.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on analyzing and processing Go code using abstract syntax trees and type information.

gotypes/nilfunc/main.go.purpose: Analyzes Go code to detect unintended comparisons of functions against nil.
side_effects: Logs errors if parsing or type checking fails.
Prints warnings for unintended nil comparisons.
risks: Potential for false positives in nil comparisons.
Log output may expose internal logic.
